example.parse: (IP (PP-PRP (P 藉著) (NP (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 伐除) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VV 枯立))))) (NP (NN 倒木))))) (DEC 之)) (NP (NN 名)))) (PU ，) (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 栖兰) (NN 桧木) (NN 林区)) (VP (VV 砍掉) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 许多)) (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (VP (VA 活生生))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 桧木)))))
example.arg: 许多 *OP* *T*-3 活生生 的 桧木
藉著 *PRO* 伐除 *OP* *T*-2 枯立 倒木 之 名
栖兰 桧木 林区
